Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), dh-r, r-base-dev, r-cran-crayon, r-cran-rlang, r-cran-fastmap (>= 1.1.1), r-cran-withr, r-cran-commonmark, r-cran-glue, r-cran-bslib (>= 0.6.0), r-cran-cachem (>= 1.1.0), r-cran-lifecycle, libjs-bootstrap, libjs-json, libjs-jquery-datatables, libjs-es5-shim, libjs-jquery, libjs-jquery-ui, libjs-highlight.js, libjs-twitter-bootstrap-datepicker, fonts-font-awesome, node-html5shiv, r-cran-rcpp, r-cran-httpuv, r-cran-mime, r-cran-jsonlite, r-cran-xtable, r-cran-fontawesome, r-cran-digest, r-cran-r6, r-cran-htmltools, r-cran-sourcetools, r-cran-later, r-cran-promises, yui-compressor
Testsuite-Triggers: r-cran-cairo, r-cran-dt, r-cran-dygraphs, r-cran-future, r-cran-ggplot2, r-cran-knitr, r-cran-magrittr, r-cran-markdown, r-cran-ragg, r-cran-rmarkdown, r-cran-sass, r-cran-testthat, r-cran-yaml
